comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message when there are no members to show on an empty screen. It appears as a centered text in the "No Contacts Item" component, providing users with guidance on what they can see.

usage.context:
<Text className="no-item-text" textAlign="center">
 {isGuests
 ? t("InfoPanel:GuestsEmptyScreenText")
 : isGroups
 ? t("InfoPanel:GroupsEmptyScreenText")
 : t("InfoPanel:MembersEmptyScreenText")}
 </Text>
 </StyledNoItemContainer>
 );
 };

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly verbose and formal for a screen text. "See members details here" is much simpler and more user-friendly. The Japanese translation reads as "Click here to view member details," which is not a direct or appropriate translation.
The added "をクリックしてご覧ください" makes the translation longer than the English, which can affect layout and readability on the screen. This makes the label more verbose.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the additional text and use a more concise phrasing.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'members' is translated as 'hóspedes'. While 'hóspedes' can mean guests, in this context 'members' likely refers to individuals who are part of a group or organization. A more accurate translation would depend on the specific context of the 'InfoPanel'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like 'Veja os detalhes dos membros aqui' or 'Veja os detalhes dos participantes aqui', depending on the meaning of 'members'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Detaliile membrilor aici' is a literal translation that doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'See members details here'. It sounds awkward in Romanian. A more natural translation would be something like 'Vezi detaliile membrilor' or 'Aici găsești detaliile membrilor'.

The translation 'Здесь будут представлены подробности об участниках' is too literal and formal for the context of a user interface element like an empty screen. It sounds stiff and doesn't convey the simple meaning of the English 'See members details here'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural and user-friendly translation would be something like 'Здесь информация об участниках' or 'Посмотрите информацию об участниках'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'මෙසේ සාමාජික විස්තර බලන්න:' is not a natural or accurate translation of 'See members details here'. 'මෙසේ' (mesei) implies 'like this' or 'this way', which isn't present in the English phrase. A more accurate translation would focus on where to find the details.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සාමාජික සාමාර්ථය මෙහි බලන්න: (Sāmājika sāmārthaya mehi balanna:)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation 'Tu nájdete podrobnosti o členoch' is a literal translation and doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'See members details here'. A more natural and user-friendly translation would be something like 'Zobrazte si detaily členov' or 'Pozrite si detaily členov'.
